segments.text: If one is rich , is the happy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think so.It ' s impossible to equate wealth and happiness .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could I understand what you said as the poorest is the happiest ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course not.Sometimes a poor man can be extremely miserable .
segments.speaker: S2
